channel.title: Spanish on Langlets Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Spanish on Langlets Blog

item.title: Learning Spanish with '20 de enero'
item.description: A deep dive into the lyrics, grammar, and hidden cultural meaning of La Oreja de Van Gogh's classic song, '20 de enero,' to help you learn Spanish.

item.title: 3 GPT Prompts to Supercharge Your Spanish Listening Practice
item.description: Use AI and comprehensible input to level up your Spanish listening skills. Learn how to build Anki decks, test comprehension, and master grammar using these 3 smart GPT prompts.
